name: Valkyrie no Densetsu
description: Valkyrie no Densetsu (ワルキューレの伝説, Legend Of The Valkyrie) is a Action RPG video game published by Namco released on 1990 for the TurboGrafx-16. It is a follow-up to the Family Computer game Valkyrie no Bōken (1986). Players control the warrior maiden Valkyrie and her lizard-like companion Kurino Xandra as they set out to drop a mythical item called the Golden Seed into the Northern Fountain to replenish the dying crop fields of Xandra Land. Gameplay involves defeating enemies and collecting gold to purchase magical spells and weapons in shops.
